Blog.post: We saw shrek 2 last night, tight ass tuesday. Very good movie, and we really enjoyed it. The theatre was filled with kids, but I don't think the jokes are targetted to kids, but adults. Very well done.

Doug bought his suit at myers on thursday, and we went looking for shoes on sat. Its good to take advantage of the sale, especially when you are tight with $. hahah. we are always tight for $, especially after we bought our house in oct. Everything goes to the house...
Sold my old phone on ebay last week and made $160 for it, v happy about it. Hmm maybe I can sell more things there, haha looking around the house for them.

Went to the Dentist today. I hate dentists, I wouldn't go to one, unless there is any thing necessary to be done to it. I had a filling a long time ago and the dentist siad, the dentist who did the filling before didnt do a good job, and it has rot to the bottom, therefore when i drink water, it hurts the nerves. OH Boy!

Just got into contact with my cousin, Steve. We haven't been keeping touch for over 5years now, as we are all busy with our lives and work. He was studying in the UK for 2 years and he lives in Hongkong (that's where my mum is from.) Feel good to be in contact with him again.

Work has been busy and 2 people has left work recently. Simon has got a new job with KPMG as a marketing executive, and Dora has quited her job to go to live in Greece with her boyfriend. How nice, I wish I could live in another country for a while. Well I am actually living in another country.. Melbourne :P I am from Singapore and I have lived in Melbourne for over 6 years now.

On sat, we went to Bridge Road to do some shopping, nothing in particular to buy. Drove past many times on the way home from Church and there are signages of sales everywhere.. Tempetations. So we went there for lunch and looked around at the shops. Picked up a cheap top from Cotton On for $10. Good Buy! Sun: sat on my ass all day and played games on the computer. Good way to spend a sunday.
Chocolates are always yum, especially when you have a bad carve. Freddos are yumo. I had one for lunch today.
4 More months, Panic, panic.. Most of the stuff are done, except flowers, printing of the invites, packing the wedding flavours. Cant wait for it to be over :0
